original_title: Police arrests 22 during IUSF protest in Colombo
original_body_lines: Police yesterday arrested 22 during a protest march organised by the Inter-University Students’ Federation (IUSF) near the Viharamahadevi Park in Colombo.
Police fired water cannons in attempts to disperse IUSF protesters in Kirulapone and near the Viharamahadevi Park during a protest march.

Earlier in the day the Colombo Fort and Maligakanda Magistrate’s Courts issued orders preventing IUSF convener Madushan Chandarajith and eight others from entering or marching in protest along Deans Road, Kularatna Mawatha, T.B. Jayah Mawatha, Technical Junction, the Presidential Secretariat, President’s House, the Prime Minister’s Office, Galle Face Green and several other nearby locations.
